data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

The ____ law ____ magnetism ____ him ____ would ____: the ____ end ____ the ____ would ____ the ____ end ____ the horseshoe-shaped magnet ____ would ____ the ____ pole. The same happened on the other side of the nail, with the result that the nail turned.
data.partBlankContent: He connected the wire of the north pole to the negative pole of the battery and the wire of the south pole to the positive pole. The ba___ law o_ magnetism to__ him wh__ would hap___: the no___ end o_ the electr_______ would re___ the no___ end o_ the horseshoe-shaped magnet a__ would att____ the so___ pole. The same happened on the other side of the nail, with the result that the nail turned.
data.fullContent: He connected the wire of the north pole to the negative pole of the battery and the wire of the south pole to the positive pole. The basic law of magnetism told him what would happen: the north end of the electromagnet would repel the north end of the horseshoe-shaped magnet and would attract the south pole. The same happened on the other side of the nail, with the result that the nail turned.
data.answer: 他把北极的电线接到电池的负极上，把南极的电线接到电池的正极上。磁性的基本定律告诉他会发生什么:电磁铁的北端排斥马蹄形磁铁的北端，而吸引南极。同样的事情发生在钉子的另一边，结果钉子转动了。
